Key Match Events: Tommy Pham hit a three-run home run in the fourth inning to give the Royals a 4-1 lead
Post-Match Reflections: Royals manager Matt Quatraro returned after missing two games following the death of his mother
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals stopped a season-high, seven-game losing streak
Others: Seth Lugo pitched seven innings, allowing one run and five hits, and earned the win
